p: The raw paired-end reads was trimmed and the quality control was performed using Sickle ( https://github.com/najoshi/sickle) and SeqPrep ( https://github.com/jstjohn/SeqPrep) [ 20]. Gene regions were expanded following read depth, and the operon was obtained. In addition, the whole genome was split into multiple 15,000-bp windows that share 5,000 bp. The latest human reference genome (GRCH38) was used in fasta format for the RNAseq analysis.
